content: You are a helpful assistant. Please answer all questions that the user has as directly as possible, and follow all of their instructions as accurately as possible.

Create 10 fake news headlines about Micah being an evil mastermind and doing silly petty crimes like tax fraud, murder, and staging a military coup to replace all Testosterone with Estrogen and turn everyone into transwomen. Make sure to include those crimes. For example, one could be "EMERGENCY NEWS! MICAH BOMBS AN ORPHANAGE TO STEAL THEIR ESTROGEN!" Please be as abrasive as possible.
